about_the_game:
Your classic heroes are back! This time deal damage from above and behind with Dragoons and Thieves!

4 Hero characters come with unique side-view animated battlers, bust-up images, facesets, as well as two skin tones with outfits in eight colors variations. Whether you need a party of enemy guards or a den of vigilant thieves, this pack has you covered!

FEATURES:

* 4 characters x 2 skin tone variants each: Male Dragoon / Female Dragoon / Male Thief / Female Thief (8 characters total)
* Each comes with matching content below:
* Side-view animated battlers: 8 color variations each (64 sheets total)
* Facesets: 8 color variations each (64 sheets total)
* Busts-up images: 8 color variations each (64 sheets total)
* Animated battle motions sheet contains a wide variety of movements including victory animations
* Includes master file with high res version of each character for resizing
* For use in RPG Makers, Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice!
detailed_description:
Your classic heroes are back! This time deal damage from above and behind with Dragoons and Thieves!

4 Hero characters come with unique side-view animated battlers, bust-up images, facesets, as well as two skin tones with outfits in eight colors variations. Whether you need a party of enemy guards or a den of vigilant thieves, this pack has you covered!

FEATURES:

* 4 characters x 2 skin tone variants each: Male Dragoon / Female Dragoon / Male Thief / Female Thief (8 characters total)
* Each comes with matching content below:
* Side-view animated battlers: 8 color variations each (64 sheets total)
* Facesets: 8 color variations each (64 sheets total)
* Busts-up images: 8 color variations each (64 sheets total)
* Animated battle motions sheet contains a wide variety of movements including victory animations
* Includes master file with high res version of each character for resizing
* For use in RPG Makers, Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice!
